name: Shell Gadus S4 V2600AD 1.5
category: Mineral oil based non EP Greases

globalDocs.name: Gadus S4 V2600AD 1.5 EN TDG V1.5 20-Nov-2015

localDocs.name: Gadus S4 V2600AD 1.5 India EN 140006501563 EHS V1.1 20-DEC-2021

marketing: Shell Gadus S4 V2600AD is a unique Lithium/Calcium soap thickened part-synthetic grease with superior adhesion and load carrying properties. It is formulated specially for very large and slow moving bearings, slides, bushes and other heavy duty industrial applications.
